page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO AREA
page.content: Our alloted area is very open and countrified with large areas of undeveloped farmland.There are lanes running through fields of wheat, barley and rape.Houses and farms are are dotted around and are often quite isolated.There are many footpaths that go through local farms and woods.It is a very quiet area with buildings of interest including a windmill and a watermill . The river Pant which travels to the Blackwater Estuary in Maldon, runs through our area slowly making its way to Shalford.The river is joined by many streams and ditches which have replaced hedges to make farming easier.
